fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
- Base: $20
- 1 Shelf: $80
- 2 Shelves: $120
- 3 Shelves: $170
- 4 Shelves: $225
- 5 Shelves: $300

Shelves cost $80 each.

fields.name: Product:
fields.value:
- The next time you land on a Walmart space, you may use the Gift Card to obtain its Product without paying Rent.
- If you're the Owner, you may use the Gift Card when you land on any opponent's Property to avoid paying Rent, unless that Property has more building on it than this Property.
